alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 04 at 2:12PM MDT until September 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN CUSTER...SOUTHERN LAWRENCE...WEST CENTRAL PENNINGTON AND NORTHEASTERN WESTON COUNTIES... At 212 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Crooks Tower to 2 miles northwest of Crazy Horse Memorial, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Hill City, Rochford, Mystic, and Black Fox Campground around 220 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Silver City, Roubaix Lake, Pactola Reservoir, Johnson Siding, Hisega and Nemo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
